book.title: The Valley of Gold
book.description: 简介： The east wind blew furiously, beating gray sheets down the streaming panes. Along the village street flowed a turbid torrent, the squalid wash of an old-timer-three-days'-blow from the Great Lakes. Threshing was hung up. Every wheel was stopped for a...
